seo.title: Fair Automatic On-Call Schedule Generator
seo.description: Create complex on-call schedules easily and fairly with FairDuty.
appDescriptionLine1: Shows the fairest result by trying multiple random combinations.
extraHolidays.description.line1: Specify additional holidays (excluding weekends) and days when no one is scheduled for on-call duty.
extraHolidays.description.click1: First click: Set as a holiday
extraHolidays.description.click2: Second click: Set as a no-duty day
variableDutyDays.label: Variable Duty Count Days
variableDutyDays.description: Select a date from the calendar, and an input field to set the number of on-duty personnel for that date will appear below.
personUnavailable.description: For each person, select unavailable dates (one click) and mandatory duty dates (two clicks).
errorRequiredFields: Required information is missing. Please check start date, end date, and person list.
errorScheduleGenerationRetries: Failed to generate schedule! Assignment was not possible after {retries} automatic retries.
getApp.title: If you want the 'longer period, more people' feature... it's in the paid app! (The server is struggling...)
getApp.description: Your $0.99 support will grow into a robust server in the future.
errors.maxPeopleReached: You can add a maximum of 10 people.
confirmations.regenerateSchedule: Any unsaved schedule will be lost. Do you want to proceed?
errors.dutyPerDayInvalid: Duties per day must be at least 1.
errors.duplicateName: A person with this name already exists. Please use a different name.
Thanks: Thank you for your purchase. We will strive to further enhance fairness.
Requests: Please send your suggestions/requests for improvement to lotusrock00@naver.com.
BetaVersion: Currently in beta â€“ you're trying it out early!
BetaVersionDescription: The maximum configurable period is 5 weeks, and you can add a maximum of 10 people (our server is still growing!).
